statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '2cbb2d38-340b-4d2a-855e-8d20bb49cefa';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 2;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY rating ASC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating < 2;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01' AND feedback_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC, feedback_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_rating = 5 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_reviews > 3 ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, review_text, review_rating FROM CustomerReview WHERE review_rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerCRM WHERE customer_company = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerCRM WHERE customer_company = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, review_rating FROM CustomerCRM JOIN CustomerReview ON CustomerCRM.customer_id = CustomerReview.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerCRM WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_system WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, profile_info, creation_date FROM customer_profiles WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crm_system WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM crm_system ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_id, profile_info FROM customer_profiles WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM CustomerReviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT C.customer_id, C.satisfaction_level, F.feedback_text FROM CustomerSatisfaction C LEFT JOIN CustomerFeedback F ON C.feedback_id = F.feedback_id;
